# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.PSE property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Page Size Extension. A value of true indicates Large pages of size 4 MByte are supported.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: PSE
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean
